segments.text: I notice the cookie jar, sitting invitingly open, just a few feet away from the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches up makes me hold my breath; he looks so determined yet so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mixture of excitement and dread watching this little heist unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And what's with the girl? She's not even trying to help him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her excitement, but I can also sense the danger lurking just beneath this joyful act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little operation is a recipe for trouble; I wish she would just alert the woman to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
